document_data.mainbody: '''Plant domain''' was a deity domain that granted divine spellcasters like [[cleric]]s with plant-related [[spell]]s and powers.
document_data.Powers: They gained the ability to rebuke or command [[plant creature]]s, and they could study knowledge of nature.
document_data.Spells: Novice spellcasters were able to use the ''[[entangle]]'', ''[[barkskin]]'', and ''[[plant growth]]'' spells. Clerics of some experience could cast ''[[control plants]]'', ''[[wall of thorns]]'', and ''[[repel wood]]''. Those that were masters of this domain had access to ''[[changestaff]]'', ''[[command plants]]'', and ''[[shambler]]''.
